attributes.action: Allow the moderate consumption of alcohol  in woodlands.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A few freinds and i had gathered to have a barbecue and enjoy a  few beers in woodland close to my home. a short while into our evening we were approached by a warden who   informed us (rather impolitely) that we were not allowed to be drinking alcohol in the woods.

Having a drink in such attractive natural surroundings is one of lifes simpler pleasures and a human right that people have been practicing until relatively recently without fear of persecution.

i support the idea of fines for those caught leaving litter behind in places of natural beauty and maybe measures to be taken against those who are agressively drunk to the extent of endangering the wellbeing of others but if people wish to have a quiet drink whilst taking into consideration the feelings of others who use these areas then i can see no problem.
